reviews.review: Hilesiz rakip ile kaliteli  vakit geçirilebiliyor...
Rekabetçi yapısıyla her geçen yıl çok gelişmese de eskiden beri arkadaşlarla oynarken zevk veren bir FPS oyunu.
Simplesmente o melhor jogo de todos.
Très bon jeu, un peu trop de russes qui tilt
A nice tactical shooter there puts a lot of weight on teamwork. Really fun to play with friends
Очень крутая игра, в бане уже года 4, всем советуюю

>see a guy
>shoot him
>miss every shot
>he turns around
>kills me in one shot
>exit cs:go

10/10

BOTs are so dumb, overall 4/10
wish valve arent lazy and half assed company that would update how BOTs work.
and also, me, gold nova master got matched with two DMGs and one MGE
Çok sevdigim ve çok zevkli bir oyun . Tavsiye ederim
I can recommend this classic game for everyone

Według mnie ta gra posiada bardzo wiele zalet, np. możesz się dowiedzieć kto rucha ci matke ponadto jest mała niespodzianka w grze a mowa tutaj o kursie języka Rosyjskiego. W skrócie jeśli chcesz nieodwracalnie zjebać sobie psychikę to gra dla ciebie. Miłej zabawy :-)
J'adore ce jeu surtout entre amis les parties sont bien plus fun !
AWP Strike: World of Cheaters, Brown Edition

The Best Game Ever to have fun.
From chilhood to the end.
jogo muito bom!!! mas só serve pra passar raiva

I think CSGO is very cute game with a lot of nice russian players with nice aim. 
Also very accurate hitboxes and it´s impossible to get angry when playing this game.

:)
Хорошая командная игра чтоб покатать вечерком с другом! Отличная графика.
这游戏很简单，把鼠标放到别人身上，点左键就行了
Muy buen juego, solo que esta lleno de chitero
Outstanding game. Balanced, updated, wonderful customization via skins, no p2w aspect. Find yourself good teammates and you'll have a blast. If you don't well...."We'll get em next time boys"
